meanings.definition: A type of board used in skimboarding.
meanings.sent1: The skimboards were colorful and lightweight.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new skimboard for my beach vacation.
meanings.sent3: The skimboards decided to have a race on the shore.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity soared as she painted the skimboards with unique designs.

meanings.definition: To ride or perform tricks on a skimboard.

meanings.sent2: They love to skimboard whenever they visit the beach.
